org.jcvi.jillion.core.pos

Class PositionSequenceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.core.pos.PositionSequenceBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Position>, SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>, Builder<PositionSequence>

    public final class PositionSequenceBuilder
extends Object
implements SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PositionSequenceBuilder()
      Create a new empty builder with the default capacity.
      PositionSequenceBuilder(int initialCapacity)
      Create a new empty builder with the given capacity.
      PositionSequenceBuilder(PositionSequence positionSequence)
      Creates a new builder whose initial sequence is set to the given PositionSequence.
      PositionSequenceBuilder(short[] initialPositions)
      Create a builder and set the initial sequence to the position values represented by the given short array.

      • build

        public PositionSequence build()
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Create a new instance using the data collected by this builder thus far.

        Create a new Sequence instance from the current mutable elements. This method does not destroy any temp data so this method could be called multiple times each time creating a new Sequence.

        Specified by:
        build in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<PositionSequence>
        Returns:
        a new Sequence; will never null but may be empty.

      • delete

        public PositionSequenceBuilder delete(Range range)
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Deletes the nucleotides from the given range of this partially constructed residue sequence. If the given range is empty, then the residue sequence will not be modified. If the range extends beyond the currently built sequence, then this will delete until the end of the sequence.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Parameters:
        range - the range to delete can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.

      • insert

                                      PositionSequenceBuilder otherBuilder)

      • insert

        public PositionSequenceBuilder insert(int offset,
                                      PositionSequence sequence)
        Inserts the PositionSequence at the specified sequence offset. The entire sequence will be added to the builder.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset into the builder to insert the position array.
        sequence - the PositionSequence to insert (can not be null).
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if positionScores is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset is less than 0 or greater than the current length of the sequence.

      • insert

        public PositionSequenceBuilder insert(int offset,
                                      Position positionScore)
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Inserts the given Residue to the builder's mutable sequence at the given offset. If any nucleotides existed downstream of this offset before this insert method was executed, then those nucleotides will be shifted by 1 base.
        Specified by:
        insert in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Parameters:
        offset - the GAPPED offset into this mutable sequence to begin insertion.
        positionScore - the Residue to be inserted at the given offset.
        Returns:
        this

      • insert

        public PositionSequenceBuilder insert(int offset,
                                      short[] positionValues)
        Inserts the given position values represented by the given byte array to the current sequence starting at the specified sequence offset. The entire array will be added to the builder. (If an element in the array has a byte value of 40, then the corresponding PhredQuality in the sequence will also have a value of 40). to this sequence.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset into the builder to insert the position array.
        positionValues - a byte array representing position scores (can not be null).
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if positionScores is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset is less than 0 or greater than the current length of the sequence.

      • trim

        public PositionSequenceBuilder trim(Range range)
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Modify the current sequence to keep only that the sub sequence within the given Range. If the range extends beyond the current sequence, then this will keep all the symbols until the end of the sequence. If the trim range is empty, then the entire sequence will be trimmed.
        Specified by:
        trim in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Parameters:
        range - the range of residues to keep (gapped).
        Returns:
        this.

      • copy

        public PositionSequenceBuilder copy()
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Create a new deep copy instance of the Builder. Any downstream modifications to either this Builder or the returned one are independent of each other.
        Specified by:
        copy in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Returns:
        a new SequenceBuilder that contains the same state as this builder; will never be null.

      • reverse

        public PositionSequenceBuilder reverse()
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Reverse but not complement all the symbols currently in this builder. Calling this method will only reverse symbols that already exist in this builder; any additional operations to insert symbols will not be affected.
        Specified by:
        reverse in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
        Returns:
        this.

      • prepend

        public PositionSequenceBuilder prepend(int positionValue)
        Inserts the given position value to the beginning of this builder's mutable sequence. This is the same as calling insert(0,Position.valueOf(positionValue))
        Parameters:
        positionValue - the position value to be inserted at the beginning of the sequence.
        Returns:
        this.

      • prepend

        public PositionSequenceBuilder prepend(PositionSequenceBuilder otherBuilder)
        Inserts the given PositionSequenceBuilder's current sequence to the beginning of this builder's mutable sequence. This is the same as calling insert(0,otherBuilder)
        Parameters:
        otherBuilder - the other PositionSequenceBuilder whose sequence should be prepended to this builder.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if otherBuilder is null.

      • prepend

        public PositionSequenceBuilder prepend(PositionSequence sequence)
        Inserts the given PositionSequence to the beginning of this builder's mutable sequence. This is the same as calling insert(0,sequence)
        Parameters:
        sequence - the PositionSequence whose sequence should be prepended to this builder.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if sequence is null.

      • iterator

        public Iterator<Position> iterator()
        Description copied from interface: SequenceBuilder
        Creates an Iterator which iterates over the current sequence. Any changes to this SequenceBuilder between creating this iterator and actually iterating over the elements might not be seen by this iterator.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Position>
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface SequenceBuilder<Position,PositionSequence>
